languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс кривит губы, глядя на вас.{/n} "Эманации варпа... и сильные. Колдовство. Прямо... в процессе". {n}Его пальцы сжимаются на оружии.{/n}
{n}Heinrix's lip curls as he looks at you.{/n} "Warp emanations... strong ones at that. Sorcery at work... before our very eyes." {n}His fingers tighten on his weapon.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс кривит губы, глядя на вас.{/n} "Эманации варпа... и сильные. Колдовство. Прямо... в процессе". {n}Его пальцы сжимаются на оружии.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希打量着你，翘起了嘴唇。{/n}“是亚空间的能量……而且非常强大。邪恶的巫术……就在我们面前。”{n}他的手握紧了武器。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he looks at you.{/n} "Warp emanations... strong ones at that. Sorcery at work... before our very eyes." {n}His fingers tighten on his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希打量着你，翘起了嘴唇。{/n}“是亚空间的能量……而且非常强大。邪恶的巫术……就在我们面前。”{n}他的手握紧了武器。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira con un mohín.{/n} «Emanaciones de la disformidad... y de las potentes. Brujería... ante nuestros propios ojos». {n}Sus dedos se cierran con fuerza en torno a la empuñadura de su arma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he looks at you.{/n} "Warp emanations... strong ones at that. Sorcery at work... before our very eyes." {n}His fingers tighten on his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira con un mohín.{/n} «Emanaciones de la disformidad... y de las potentes. Brujería... ante nuestros propios ojos». {n}Sus dedos se cierran con fuerza en torno a la empuñadura de su arma.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sana bakarken dudağını büküyor.{/n} "Öteboyut sızıntıları... Hem de güçlü olanlardan. Gözlerimizin önünde sahirliğe kalkışılmış." {n}Parmaklarıyla silahını kavrıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he looks at you.{/n} "Warp emanations... strong ones at that. Sorcery at work... before our very eyes." {n}His fingers tighten on his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sana bakarken dudağını büküyor.{/n} "Öteboyut sızıntıları... Hem de güçlü olanlardan. Gözlerimizin önünde sahirliğe kalkışılmış." {n}Parmaklarıyla silahını kavrıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの唇は、あなたを見ると歪む。{/n}「<歪み>の流れ…そこから強いそれを感じる。我々の目の前にあるのは、魔術のせいか…」{n}彼の指は武器を強く握りしめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he looks at you.{/n} "Warp emanations... strong ones at that. Sorcery at work... before our very eyes." {n}His fingers tighten on his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの唇は、あなたを見ると歪む。{/n}「<歪み>の流れ…そこから強いそれを感じる。我々の目の前にあるのは、魔術のせいか…」{n}彼の指は武器を強く握りしめる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix retrousse la lèvre en vous regardant.{/n} « Des émanations du Warp... et puissantes, en plus. Il y a bien une sorcellerie à l'œuvre juste sous yeux. » {n}Il raffermit sa prise sur son arme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he looks at you.{/n} "Warp emanations... strong ones at that. Sorcery at work... before our very eyes." {n}His fingers tighten on his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix retrousse la lèvre en vous regardant.{/n} « Des émanations du Warp... et puissantes, en plus. Il y a bien une sorcellerie à l'œuvre juste sous yeux. » {n}Il raffermit sa prise sur son arme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schürzt die Lippen, als er dich betrachtet.{/n} "Warp-Ausstrahlungen ... und zwar starke. Zauberei ... vor unseren Augen." {n}Seine Finger legen sich fester um seine Waffe.{/n}
